text:
Hi ! I've created a search bar module where i inject js and css in the module.html file. I'm having an issue where when I add the module to my page (drag & drop to a website page), it initializes a search bar but it doesnt actually function (cant click, no redirect) due to conflicting css between the theme page and the search bar module.

Is there a way to exclude a module from built-in page css? or what is the best solution because just remove the conflicting css enlarged the search bar to match the other page sections which wont work!

Thanks!
when the conflicting css is removed

topic:
